job_description: Develop visual concepts for company branding across both online and offline channels. - Design promotional materials such as banners, posters, social media content, and other communication assets. - Manage and update the company website’s visual appearance, including layout, graphics, and content updates. - Collaborate with the marketing/communications team to produce designs aligned with brand identity. - Create digital assets such as illustrations, icons, infographics, and design templates. - Perform basic photo and video editing to support publication needs. - Ensure all design outputs are consistent and meet the company’s quality standards.
